item.title: Things to do after a new Debian installation
item.description: So you have a new Debian installation? Maybe a minimal install like I do? Don’t worry, I have you covered what to do next. Setup a sudo user without password Go here . Install software Install software for daily use. $ sudo apt install build-essential \ git zsh mpv feh xss-lock urlview \ xbindkeys stow offlineimap mutt msmtp \ notmuch vim.nox rxvt-unicode -y Setup touchpad If you have a machine that supports multitouch, enabling tap to click is a good option.
